publication.abstract: Summary: Gene expression index calculations from Affymetrix GeneChips have been dominated by the Affymetrix MAS, dChip, and RMA methods. A new method to estimate the gene expression value utilizing the probe sequence information named position-dependent nearest-neighbor (PDNN) has been suggested by Zhang et al. (2003). Here we describe an open source implementation of the PDNN method for the statistical language R. Â© The Author 2004. Published by Oxford University Press. All rights reserved.
publication.title: Implementation of a gene expression index calculation method based on the PDNN model

summary.description: The package contains functions to perform the PDNN method described by Li Zhang et al.
summary.name: affypdnn
